item.title: First_post
item.description: First post This is the first post. I have based this website around hugo so I should be documenting whatever I have done here to correctly set it up like I did. Blowfish looks nice to the website and setting it up around tailwind css seems alright. We also need to also setup a better theming later on when I get the chance to do so correctly.
